snippet: American officials say Iran has made no effort to use its influence to get the Syrian government to cease bombing and allow humanitarian aid.
abstract: American officials say Iran will not participate in peace talks on Syria.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone and Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: American officials say Iran has made no effort to use its influence to get the Syrian government to cease bombing and allow humanitarian aid.

headline.main: U.S. Says Iran Won’t Attend Peace Talks on Syria
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Iran Won’t Attend Peace Talks On Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
